Bates Motel ( in Brazil , Bates Motel ) is an American drama television series developed for television by Carlton Cuse , Kerry Ehrin and Anthony Cipriano , produced by Universal Television and broadcast by A & E.
The series is a " contemporary prequel " to the 1960 film Psycho ( based on the novel of the same name written by Robert Bloch ) , portrays the life of Norman Bates and his mother Norma before the events portrayed in Alfred Hitchcock film. The series begins after the death of her husband of Norma , when it acquires a motel located in a coastal Oregon town , so she and Norman can start a new life .
The series was filmed in Aldergrove , British Columbia , Canada and premiered on March 18, 2013 in A & a.e A & E network decided to order 10 episodes for the first season of the series .
